history: Test config for DFOLS algorithm and Vn3 of OptClim. Perturbing 14 parameters and suing simple_model
Developer_comment: StudyConfig.py provides methods that work with this configuration file. Remember to change them if you change structure of this.
Name: dfols_r

run_info.runTime_comment: Time in seconds for run. Should be enough for simple_model
run_info.runCode_comment: Project code to run job under.
run_info.submit_engine_comment: Name of engine to submit runs to. One of SGE or SLURM. MUST be provided
run_info.ssh_node_comment: If not null then name of machine which has access to engine. Will ssh to this machine to submit commands
run_info.modelName_comment: Name of model that is ran. MUST be provided
run_info.maxRuns_comment: Maximum number of runs to do in parallel. Runs submitted is 2x this + 1.
run_info.max_model_simulations_comment: The maximum number of model sims to be done

run_info_comment: Information  for run_info. Must include submit_engine and modelName. Can include other keys for use in submission. Useful ones are runTime, runCode & maxRuns
optimiseFunction_comment: Name of optimisation function to run. null gives default
runUpgrade_vn4: For vn4 add list of things to do here!

initParams._comment: Initial values for parameters to be optimised. Set to null to use default values.

initial.initScale_comment: If true then startParams range from 0 to 1 where 0 means min value; 1 max value.

fixedParams._comment: List of parameters and values that are fixed and not modified in optimisation. Set to null to use default values
fixedParams.START_TIME_comment: Start time as an iso string
fixedParams.RUN_TARGET_comment: RUN_TARGET as an iso duration string.

initial.fixedScale_comment: If true then scalable fixedParams range from 0 to 1 where 0 means min value; 1 max value.

study.comment: Parameters that specify the study. Used by framework and not by optimisation routines
study.referenceModelDirectory_comment: Directory where reference model configuration exists. Default is START_DIR/start

covariance.comment: Covariance matrices and operations on them. If CovObsErr and CovIntVar are *both* specified then CovTotal will be computed from them
covariance.CovTotal_Comment: Name of file containing Covariance Matrix for total Error.
covariance.CovTotalDiagonalise_comment: If true diagonalise the total covariance matrix
covariance.CovIntVar_Comment: Name of file containing Covariance Matrix of Internal Variability
covariance.CovIntVarDiagonalise_comment: If true diagonalise the internal variability covariance matrix
covariance.CovObsErr_Comment: Name of file containing Covariance Matrix for Observational Error
covariance.CovObsErrDiagonalise_comment: If true diagonalise the Observational Error covariance matrix

study.ObsList_comment: List of Observations that Algorithm uses which should be generated by post processing of model
study.constraintName_comment: Name of constraint variable -- target value defined by targets/constraintName.

postProcess.comment: Options to control post processing. Details depend on your post processing script.
postProcess.script_comment: Full path name -- including any environment variables you might have -- to postprocessing script
postProcess.output_path_comment: output path relative to model dir -- should be one of .nc, .json or .csv. Default is sim_obs.json
postProcess.note: Specify mask_file -- file where l/s mask is, name of mask, start and end times
postProcess.mask_file_comment: Path to mask file. Example value is for N48 HadAM3
postProcess.mask_name_comment: Name of mask variable. Depends on file..

targets.comment: Observed targets for optimisation. Should include constraint value.

scalings.comment: Scalings on observables -- only defined when not 1.0

SimulatedValues.comment: Values from Initial Cond ensemble -- used for display
